content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, it's a pleasure to meet you. As a landlord, I want to make sure that I am getting the best possible price for my apartment. Can you tell me what you are willing to pay for the 25 square meter apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am willing to pay a fair price. What is your rental price?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: The rental price for the 25 square meter apartment is negotiable. I am open to discussing a fair price with you, but please understand that as a landlord, I want to maximize my gains. Can you tell me what you think a fair price would be for this apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I would say around 300 Euros per month. But I am willing to discuss further.

Please let me know if you have any questions or if you need any further information from me.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for your offer, Max. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I will take your offer into consideration, but I want to make sure that I am getting the best possible price for my apartment. Can you tell me more about your budget and why you are willing to pay 300 Euros per month for a 25 square meter apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine
